messages.title: The Tories want to cut Child Tax Credits and Child Trust Funds and let nurseries charge you top-up fees.

issues.socialWelfare: The Tories want to cut Child Tax Credits and Child Trust Funds and let nurseries charge you top-up fees.

endorsements.endorsement: Over the last 13 years a lot has changed for the good. There is more support for families and pensioners. There are more police on our streets. Britain has got better.

quotes.text: Over the last 13 years a lot has changed for the good. There is more support for families and pensioners. There are more police on our streets. Britain has got better.

images.caption: Alex Ferguson against a backdrop of campaign messaging.
